title: Remove Basic and Premium pricing plans from dashboard

requirements.text: Remove the PricingTable component from the CommandCenter dashboard page that displays the Basic plan ($299/month) and Premium plan ($499/month)

quotes: Remove the basic plan of 299$ and premium plan pf 499$ from the dashboard

acceptanceCriteria: The pricing table with Basic and Premium plans is no longer visible on the dashboard
The dashboard layout adjusts appropriately without the pricing table section
No pricing plan information appears in the CommandCenter view

constraints: Do not modify the PricingTable component itself, only remove its usage from CommandCenter
Preserve all other dashboard components (KPI metrics, security traffic trends, active identities, control panel)
nonGoals: Modifying the Subscriptions page pricing display
